survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Voice-Activated In-Car Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction levels with voice-activated assistants in modern vehicles, focusing on usability, functionality, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the voice-activated assistant in your vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options cover all typical usage frequencies. Mobile-friendly radio buttons recommended.
